name: Baby 5
text: Activate: Main (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area) You may rest this character: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with the (Donquixote Pirates) type and add it to your hand. Then, place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
